https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uZofVPYFUphtTT68sOfdZHJZTbU.jpg In search of a story, an up-and-coming journalist goes back to her home town and uncovers a forgotten tale of young love, inspiring her to follow her heart and find her own true love. A Christmas for Mary
